SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\nimport \"./interfaces/IBurnRouter.sol\";\n\nabstract contract BurnRouterStorage is IBurnRouter {\n\n    // Constants\n    uint constant MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE = 10000; // 10000 means 100%\n    uint constant UNUSED_VARIABLE = 0; // Unused variable\n\n    // Public variables\n    address public override relay;\n    address public override lockers;\n    address public override teleBTC;\n    address public override treasury;\n    address public override bitcoinFeeOracle;\n    uint public override startingBlockNumber;\n    uint public override transferDeadline;\n    uint public override protocolPercentageFee; // Min amount is %0.01\n    uint public override slasherPercentageReward; // Min amount is %1\n    uint public override bitcoinFee; // Fee of submitting a tx on Bitcoin\n    \n    mapping(address => burnRequest[]) public burnRequests; \n    // ^ Mapping from locker target address to assigned burn requests\n    mapping(address => uint) public burnRequestCounter;\n    mapping(bytes32 => bool) public override isUsedAsBurnProof; \n    // ^ Mapping that shows a txId has been submitted to pay a burn request\n\n}","keccak256":"0x4858e0735e83447bf8c4d22194ef7b1eacfb1d258c152b97a3de9a4f2366395f","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/CcExchangeRouterLib.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\nimport \"@teleportdao/btc-evm-bridge/contracts/relay/interfaces/IBitcoinRelay.sol\";\nimport \"@teleportdao/btc-evm-bridge/contracts/libraries/BitcoinHelper.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Address.sol\";\nimport \"../routers/interfaces/ICcExchangeRouter.sol\";\nimport \"./RequestParser.sol\";\n\nlibrary CcExchangeRouterLib {\n    /// @notice Parses and stores exchange request if it's valid\n    function ccExchangeHelper(\n        ICcExchangeRouter.TxAndProof memory _txAndProof,\n        mapping(bytes32 => ICcExchangeRouter.ccExchangeRequest)\n            storage ccExchangeRequests,\n        mapping(bytes32 => ICcExchangeRouter.extendedCcExchangeRequest)\n            storage extendedCcExchangeRequests,\n        address _teleBTC,\n        bytes memory _lockerLockingScript,\n        address _relay\n    ) external returns (bytes32) {\n        // Finds tx id\n        bytes32 txId = BitcoinHelper.calculateTxId(\n            _txAndProof.version,\n            _txAndProof.vin,\n            _txAndProof.vout,\n            _txAndProof.locktime\n        );\n\n        // Checks that the request has not been processed before\n        require(\n            !ccExchangeRequests[txId].isUsed,\n            \"ExchangeRouterLib: already used\"\n        );\n\n        // Extracts value and OP_RETURN data from the request\n        ICcExchangeRouter.ccExchangeRequest memory request;\n        bytes memory arbitraryData;\n\n        (request.inputAmount, arbitraryData) = BitcoinHelper\n            .parseValueAndDataHavingLockingScriptSmallPayload(\n                _txAndProof.vout,\n                _lockerLockingScript\n            );\n\n        /*  \n            Exchange requests structure:\n            1) chainId, 2 byte: max 65535 chains\n            2) appId, 1 byte: max 256 apps\n            3) recipientAddress, 20 byte: EVM account\n            4) networkFee, 3 byte\n            5) SPEED, 1 byte: {0,1}\n            6) thirdParty, 1 byte: max 256 third parties, default is 0 for no third party\n            7) exchangeToken, 20 byte: token address\n            8) outputAmount, 14 byte: min expected output amount. Assuming that the token supply\n               is less than 10^15 and token decimal is 18 (> (10^18) * (10^18))\n            9) bridgeFee, 3 byte: will be multiply by 10^11, 10^18 means 100%, so the minimum \n            amount of fee percentage is 10^-5%\n            TOTAL = 65 BYTE\n        */\n        require(arbitraryData.length == 65, \"ExchangeRouterLib: invalid len\");\n        require(request.inputAmount > 0, \"ExchangeRouterLib: zero input\");\n\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].chainId = RequestParser.parseChainId(\n            arbitraryData\n        );\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].bridgeFee =\n            uint(RequestParser.parseArossFeePercentage(arbitraryData)) *\n            (10 ** 11);\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].thirdParty = RequestParser\n            .parseThirdPartyId(arbitraryData);\n\n        request.appId = RequestParser.parseAppId(arbitraryData);\n        address exchangeToken = RequestParser.parseExchangeToken(arbitraryData);\n        request.outputAmount = RequestParser.parseExchangeOutputAmount(\n            arbitraryData\n        );\n        request.isFixedToken = true; // Note: we assume input amount is fixed\n        request.recipientAddress = RequestParser.parseRecipientAddress(\n            arbitraryData\n        );\n\n        // Note: default exchange path is: [teleBTC, exchangeToken]\n        request.path = new address[](2);\n        request.path[0] = _teleBTC;\n        request.path[1] = exchangeToken;\n\n        // Finds Teleporter fee\n        uint networkFee = RequestParser.parseNetworkFee(arbitraryData);\n\n        require(\n            networkFee <= request.inputAmount,\n            \"ExchangeRouterLib: wrong fee\"\n        );\n        request.fee = networkFee;\n\n        // Note: speed now determines using fillers to speed up filling request (speed = 1) or not\n        request.speed = RequestParser.parseSpeed(arbitraryData);\n\n        request.isUsed = true;\n\n        // Saves request\n        ccExchangeRequests[txId] = request;\n\n        require(\n            _isConfirmed(_txAndProof, _relay, txId),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: not finalized\"\n        );\n\n        return txId;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Verifies the signature of _msgHash\n    /// @return _signer Address of message signer (if signature is valid)\n    function _verifySig(\n        bytes memory message,\n        bytes32 r,\n        bytes32 s,\n        uint8 v\n    ) public pure returns (address) {\n        // Compute the message hash\n        bytes32 messageHash = keccak256(message);\n\n        // Prefix the message hash as per the Ethereum signing standard\n        bytes32 ethSignedMessageHash = keccak256(\n            abi.encodePacked(\"\\x19Ethereum Signed Message:\\n32\", messageHash)\n        );\n\n        // Verify the message using ecrecover\n        address signer = ecrecover(ethSignedMessageHash, v, r, s);\n        require(signer != address(0), \"PolygonConnectorLogic: Invalid sig\");\n\n        return signer;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Checks inclusion of the transaction in the specified block\n    /// @dev Calls the relay contract to check Merkle inclusion proof\n    /// @param _relay Address of Relay contract\n    /// @param _txId of the transaction\n    /// @return True if the transaction was included in the block\n    function _isConfirmed(\n        ICcExchangeRouter.TxAndProof memory _txAndProof,\n        address _relay,\n        bytes32 _txId\n    ) internal returns (bool) {\n        // Finds fee amount\n        uint feeAmount = _getFinalizedBlockHeaderFee(\n            _relay,\n            _txAndProof.blockNumber\n        );\n        require(msg.value >= feeAmount, \"ExchangeRouterLib: low fee\");\n\n        // Calls relay contract\n        bytes memory data = Address.functionCallWithValue(\n            _relay,\n            abi.encodeWithSignature(\n                \"checkTxProof(bytes32,uint256,bytes,uint256)\",\n                _txId,\n                _txAndProof.blockNumber,\n                _txAndProof.intermediateNodes,\n                _txAndProof.index\n            ),\n            feeAmount\n        );\n\n        // Sends extra ETH back to msg.sender\n        Address.sendValue(payable(msg.sender), msg.value - feeAmount);\n\n        return abi.decode(data, (bool));\n    }\n\n    function _getFinalizedBlockHeaderFee(\n        address _relay,\n        uint _blockNumber\n    ) private view returns (uint) {\n        return IBitcoinRelay(_relay).getBlockHeaderFee(_blockNumber, 0);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xa7f0053a620e049c5a00660777f9263ae5aa91d260a60f5085a0701245678d1a","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/CcExchangeRouterLogic.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\nimport \"./CcExchangeRouterStorage.sol\";\nimport \"./CcExchangeRouterStorageV2.sol\";\nimport \"./interfaces/IBurnRouter.sol\";\nimport \"../dex_connectors/interfaces/IDexConnector.sol\";\nimport \"../erc20/interfaces/ITeleBTC.sol\";\nimport \"../erc20/WETH.sol\";\nimport \"../lockersManager/interfaces/ILockersManager.sol\";\nimport \"./CcExchangeRouterLib.sol\";\nimport \"../routers/BurnRouterStorage.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/access/OwnableUpgradeable.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/security/ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable.sol\";\nimport \"solidity-bytes-utils/contracts/BytesLib.sol\";\n\ncontract CcExchangeRouterLogic is\n    CcExchangeRouterStorage,\n    OwnableUpgradeable,\n    ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable,\n    CcExchangeRouterStorageV2\n{\n    using BytesLib for bytes;\n\n    error ZeroAddress();\n\n    modifier nonZeroAddress(address _address) {\n        if (_address == address(0)) revert ZeroAddress();\n        _;\n    }\n\n    // Contract is payable\n    receive() external payable {}\n\n    /// @notice Initialize CcExchangeRouter\n    /// @param _startingBlockNumber Transactions that are included in blocks older\n    ///                             than _startingBlockNumber cannot be processed\n    /// @param _protocolPercentageFee Protocol percentage fee (min: %0.01).\n    ///                               This fee goes to treasury from each wrapAndSwap request\n    /// @param _chainId Chain Id of the current chain\n    /// @param _relay Address of BitcoinRelay which checks Bitcoin transactions inclusion\n    /// @param _lockers LockersManager contract address\n    /// @param _teleBTC TeleBTC token\n    /// @param _treasury Treasury collects protocol fees\n    function initialize(\n        uint256 _startingBlockNumber,\n        uint256 _protocolPercentageFee,\n        uint256 _lockerPercentageFee,\n        uint256 _chainId,\n        address _lockers,\n        address _relay,\n        address _teleBTC,\n        address _treasury,\n        address _across,\n        address _burnRouter\n    ) public initializer {\n        OwnableUpgradeable.__Ownable_init();\n        ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable.__ReentrancyGuard_init();\n\n        chainId = _chainId;\n        _setStartingBlockNumber(_startingBlockNumber);\n        _setProtocolPercentageFee(_protocolPercentageFee);\n        _setLockerPercentageFee(_lockerPercentageFee);\n        _setRelay(_relay);\n        _setLockers(_lockers);\n        _setTeleBTC(_teleBTC);\n        _setTreasury(_treasury);\n        _setAcross(_across);\n        _setBurnRouter(_burnRouter);\n    }\n\n    function renounceOwnership() public virtual override onlyOwner {}\n\n    /// @notice Setter for starting block number\n    function setStartingBlockNumber(\n        uint256 _startingBlockNumber\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setStartingBlockNumber(_startingBlockNumber);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Update Relay address\n    function setRelay(address _relay) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setRelay(_relay);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Address of special Teleporter that can submit requests\n    function setSpecialTeleporter(\n        address _specialTeleporter\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setSpecialTeleporter(_specialTeleporter);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Update LockersManager address\n    function setLockers(address _lockers) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setLockers(_lockers);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Assign an exchange connector to an app id\n    /// @dev Users determine which DEX to use by determining the app id.\n    function setExchangeConnector(\n        uint256 _appId,\n        address _exchangeConnector\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        exchangeConnector[_appId] = _exchangeConnector;\n        emit SetExchangeConnector(_appId, _exchangeConnector);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Update TeleBTC address\n    function setTeleBTC(address _teleBTC) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setTeleBTC(_teleBTC);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for protocol percentage fee\n    function setProtocolPercentageFee(\n        uint256 _protocolPercentageFee\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setProtocolPercentageFee(_protocolPercentageFee);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for locker percentage fee\n    function setLockerPercentageFee(\n        uint256 _lockerPercentageFee\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setLockerPercentageFee(_lockerPercentageFee);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for treasury\n    function setTreasury(address _treasury) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setTreasury(_treasury);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for across\n    /// @dev Across is used to send exchanged tokens to other chains\n    function setAcross(address _across) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setAcross(_across);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for BurnRouter\n    function setBurnRouter(address _burnRouter) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setBurnRouter(_burnRouter);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for third party\n    /// @dev Each third party has an id and an address.\n    ///      Users determine the third party by determining the id in the request.\n    ///      Third party fee is sent to the third party address.\n    function setThirdPartyAddress(\n        uint256 _thirdPartyId,\n        address _thirdPartyAddress\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setThirdPartyAddress(_thirdPartyId, _thirdPartyAddress);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for third party fee\n    /// @dev Third party fee is a percentage of the input amount.\n    ///      Third parties can set their own fees.\n    function setThirdPartyFee(\n        uint256 _thirdPartyId,\n        uint256 _thirdPartyFee\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setThirdPartyFee(_thirdPartyId, _thirdPartyFee);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for wrapped native token\n    function setWrappedNativeToken(\n        address _wrappedNativeToken\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setWrappedNativeToken(_wrappedNativeToken);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for chain id mapping\n    /// @dev After processing a request, the exchanged token is sent to the destination chain.\n    function setChainIdMapping(\n        uint256 _destinationChain,\n        uint256 _mappedId\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        _setChainIdMapping(_destinationChain, _mappedId);\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for Across Admin\n    function setAcrossAdmin(address _acrossAdmin) external onlyOwner {\n        acrossAdmin = _acrossAdmin;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Setter for reward distributor\n    /// @dev This contract distributes locker fee between locker and stakers\n    function setRewardDistributor(\n        address _rewardDistributor\n    ) external override onlyOwner {\n        rewardDistributor = _rewardDistributor;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Check if a request has been processed\n    /// @dev It prevents re-submitting a processed request\n    /// @param _txId The transaction ID of request on Bitcoin\n    /// @return True if the cc exchange request has been already executed\n    function isRequestUsed(\n        bytes32 _txId\n    ) external view override returns (bool) {\n        return ccExchangeRequests[_txId].isUsed ? true : false;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Return the destination chain\n    function getDestChainId(uint256 chainId) public view returns (uint256) {\n        return chainIdMapping[chainId].destinationChain;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Process a wrapAndSwap request after checking its inclusion on Bitcoin\n    /// @dev Steps to process a request:\n    ///      1. Check transaction inclusion on Bitcoin\n    ///      2. Extract the request info\n    ///      3. Mint TeleBTC and send fees to protocol, Locker, and third party\n    ///      4. Exchange TeleBTC for the output token\n    ///      5.1 Send the output token to the user\n    ///      5.2 Send TeleBTC to user if exchange fails and the request belongs to the current chain\n    ///      5.3 Keep TeleBTC if exchange fails and the request doesn't blong to the current chain\n    /// @param _txAndProof Transaction and inclusion proof data\n    /// @param _lockerLockingScript Script hash of Locker that user has sent BTC to it\n    /// @param _path (Optional) Exchange path from teleBTC to the output token.\n    function wrapAndSwap(\n        TxAndProof memory _txAndProof,\n        bytes calldata _lockerLockingScript,\n        address[] memory _path\n    ) external payable virtual override nonReentrant returns (bool) {\n        // Basic checks\n        require(\n            _msgSender() == specialTeleporter,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: invalid sender\"\n        ); // Only Teleporter can submit requests\n        require(\n            _txAndProof.blockNumber >= startingBlockNumber,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: old request\"\n        );\n        require(\n            _txAndProof.locktime == bytes4(0),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: non-zero locktime\"\n        );\n\n        // Check that the given script hash is Locker\n        require(\n            ILockersManager(lockers).isLocker(_lockerLockingScript),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: not locker\"\n        );\n\n        // Extract request info and check if tx has been finalized on Bitcoin\n        bytes32 txId = CcExchangeRouterLib.ccExchangeHelper(\n            _txAndProof,\n            ccExchangeRequests,\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests,\n            teleBTC,\n            _lockerLockingScript,\n            relay\n        );\n\n        // Find destination chain Id (the final chain that user gets its token on it)\n        uint256 destinationChainId = getDestChainId(\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].chainId\n        );\n\n        require(\n            destinationChainId != 0,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: invalid chain id\"\n        );\n\n        ccExchangeRequest memory request = ccExchangeRequests[txId];\n\n        address _exchangeConnector = exchangeConnector[request.appId];\n        require(\n            _exchangeConnector != address(0),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: invalid appId\"\n        );\n\n        // Find remained amount after reducing fees\n        _mintAndCalculateFees(_lockerLockingScript, txId);\n\n        if (request.speed == 1) { // Handle fast request\n            /* \n                If there was a filler who filled the request with the same parameters,\n                we will send the TeleBTC to the filler\n            */\n            address filler = fillerAddress[txId][request.recipientAddress][\n                request.path[request.path.length - 1]\n            ][request.outputAmount][destinationChainId][extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].bridgeFee];\n\n            if (filler != address(0)) { // Request has been filled\n                // Send TeleBTC to filler who filled the request\n                _sendTeleBtcToFiller(\n                    filler,\n                    txId,\n                    _lockerLockingScript,\n                    destinationChainId\n                );\n                return true;\n            } else { // Request has not been filled\n                // Treat it as a normal request\n                ccExchangeRequests[txId].speed = 0;\n            }\n        }\n\n        _wrapAndSwap(\n            _exchangeConnector,\n            _lockerLockingScript,\n            txId,\n            _path,\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].bridgeFee,\n            destinationChainId\n        );\n\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Process a wrapAndSwap request with a custom bridge fee after checking its inclusion on Bitcoin\n    /// @dev Similar to wrapAndSwap but allows Teleporter to specify a custom bridge fee\n    function wrapAndSwapWithCustomBridgeFee(\n        TxAndProof memory _txAndProof,\n        bytes calldata _lockerLockingScript,\n        address[] memory _path,\n        uint256 _customBridgeFee\n    ) external payable virtual override nonReentrant returns (bool) {\n        // Basic checks\n        require(\n            _msgSender() == specialTeleporter,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: invalid sender\"\n        ); // Only Teleporter can submit requests\n        require(\n            _txAndProof.blockNumber >= startingBlockNumber,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: old request\"\n        );\n        require(\n            _txAndProof.locktime == bytes4(0),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: non-zero locktime\"\n        );\n\n        // Check that the given script hash is Locker\n        require(\n            ILockersManager(lockers).isLocker(_lockerLockingScript),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: not locker\"\n        );\n\n        // Extract request info and check if tx has been finalized on Bitcoin\n        bytes32 txId = CcExchangeRouterLib.ccExchangeHelper(\n            _txAndProof,\n            ccExchangeRequests,\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests,\n            teleBTC,\n            _lockerLockingScript,\n            relay\n        );\n\n        // Find destination chain Id (the final chain that user gets its token on it)\n        uint256 destinationChainId = getDestChainId(\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests[txId].chainId\n        );\n\n        ccExchangeRequest memory request = ccExchangeRequests[txId];\n\n        address _exchangeConnector = exchangeConnector[request.appId];\n        require(\n            _exchangeConnector != address(0),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: invalid appId\"\n        );\n\n        // Find remained amount after reducing fees\n        _mintAndCalculateFees(_lockerLockingScript, txId);\n\n        if (request.speed == 1) { // Handle fast request\n            /* \n                If there was a filler who filled the request with the same parameters,\n                we will send the TeleBTC to the filler\n            */\n            address filler = fillerAddress[txId][request.recipientAddress][\n                request.path[request.path.length - 1]\n            ][request.outputAmount][destinationChainId][_customBridgeFee];\n\n            if (filler != address(0)) { // Request has been filled\n                // Send TeleBTC to filler who filled the request\n                _sendTeleBtcToFiller(\n                    filler,\n                    txId,\n                    _lockerLockingScript,\n                    destinationChainId\n                );\n                return true;\n            } else { // Request has not been filled\n                // Treat it as a normal request\n                ccExchangeRequests[txId].speed = 0;\n            }\n        }\n\n        _wrapAndSwap(\n            _exchangeConnector,\n            _lockerLockingScript,\n            txId,\n            _path,\n            _customBridgeFee,\n            destinationChainId\n        );\n\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Filler fills an upcoming exchange request\n    /// @param _txId Bitcoin request that filler wants to fill\n    /// @param _token Address of exchange token in the request\n    /// @param _amount Requested exchanging amount\n    function fillTx(\n        bytes32 _txId,\n        address _recipient,\n        address _token,\n        uint _amount,\n        uint _destinationChainId,\n        uint _bridgeFee\n    ) external payable nonReentrant override {\n        // Checks that the request has not been processed before normally\n        require(\n            !ccExchangeRequests[_txId].isUsed,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: already processed\"\n        );\n\n        /* \n            If another filler has filled the request with the same parameters,\n            the request will be rejected\n        */\n        require(\n            fillerAddress[_txId][_recipient][_token][_amount][\n                _destinationChainId\n            ][_bridgeFee] == address(0),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: already filled\"\n        );\n\n        // Record the filler address\n        fillerAddress[_txId][_recipient][_token][_amount][_destinationChainId][_bridgeFee] = _msgSender();\n\n        if (_destinationChainId == chainId) { // Requests that belongs to the current chain\n            if (_token == NATIVE_TOKEN) {\n                // Native token is sent to the recipient\n                require(msg.value == _amount, \"ExchangeRouter: wrong amount\");\n                (bool sentToRecipient, ) = _recipient.call{value: _amount}(\"\");\n                require(sentToRecipient, \"ExchangeRouter: transfer failed\");\n            } else {\n                // Transfer the token from the filler to the recipient\n                require(\n                    IERC20(_token).transferFrom(\n                        _msgSender(),\n                        _recipient,\n                        _amount\n                    ),\n                    \"ExchangeRouter: no allowance\"\n                );\n            }\n        } else { // Requests that belongs to the other chain\n            // Transfer the token from the filler to the contract\n            require(\n                IERC20(_token).transferFrom(\n                    _msgSender(),\n                    address(this),\n                    _amount\n                ),\n                \"ExchangeRouter: no allowance\"\n            );\n            _sendTokenToOtherChain(\n                _destinationChainId,\n                _token,\n                _amount,\n                _recipient,\n                _bridgeFee\n            );\n        }\n\n        emit RequestFilled(\n            _msgSender(),\n            _txId,\n            _recipient,\n            _token,\n            _amount,\n            _destinationChainId,\n            _bridgeFee\n        );\n    }\n\n    function refundByOwnerOrAdmin(\n        bytes32 _txId,\n        uint8 _scriptType,\n        bytes memory _userScript,\n        bytes calldata _lockerLockingScript\n    ) external override nonReentrant {\n        // TODO: Make it trustless. Store the outpoint of the failed tx,\n        //      so we can find the script type and user script in the future having the tx\n        require(\n            msg.sender == acrossAdmin || msg.sender == owner(),\n            \"ExchangeRouter: not authorized\"\n        );\n\n        // Check that the request has not been completed\n        require(\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].isRequestCompleted == false,\n            \"ExchangeRouter: already processed\"\n        );\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].isRequestCompleted = true;\n\n        uint256 failedRequestAmount = extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId]\n            .remainedInputAmount;\n\n        // Burns teleBTC for user\n        ITeleBTC(teleBTC).approve(burnRouter, failedRequestAmount);\n\n        address lockerTargetAddress = ILockersManager(lockers)\n            .getLockerTargetAddress(_lockerLockingScript);\n\n        uint256 refundAmount = IBurnRouter(burnRouter).unwrap(\n            failedRequestAmount,\n            _userScript,\n            ScriptTypes(_scriptType),\n            _lockerLockingScript,\n            0\n        );\n\n        emit RefundProcessed(\n            _txId,\n            msg.sender,\n            failedRequestAmount,\n            refundAmount,\n            _userScript,\n            _scriptType,\n            lockerTargetAddress,\n            BurnRouterStorage(burnRouter).burnRequestCounter(\n                lockerTargetAddress\n            ) - 1\n        );\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Emergency withdraw tokens from contract\n    function emergencyWithdraw(\n        address _token,\n        uint256 _amount\n    ) external onlyOwner nonReentrant {\n        if (_token == NATIVE_TOKEN) {\n            Address.sendValue(payable(owner()), _amount);\n        } else {\n            IERC20(_token).transfer(owner(), _amount);\n        }\n    }\n\n    function _sendTeleBtcToFiller(\n        address _filler,\n        bytes32 _txId,\n        bytes memory _lockerLockingScript,\n        uint256 _destinationChainId\n    ) private {\n        // Send fees to the teleporter, treasury, and third party\n        _sendFees(_txId, _lockerLockingScript);\n\n        ccExchangeRequest memory request = ccExchangeRequests[_txId];\n        extendedCcExchangeRequest\n            memory extendedRequest = extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId];\n\n        // Mark the request as completed\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].isRequestCompleted = true;\n\n        // Send TeleBTC to filler\n        ITeleBTC(teleBTC).transfer(\n            _filler,\n            extendedRequest.remainedInputAmount\n        );\n\n        uint256[5] memory fees = [\n            request.fee,\n            extendedRequest.lockerFee,\n            extendedRequest.protocolFee,\n            extendedRequest.thirdPartyFee,\n            extendedRequest.bridgeFee\n        ];\n\n        emit NewWrapAndSwap(\n            ILockersManager(lockers).getLockerTargetAddress(\n                _lockerLockingScript\n            ),\n            request.recipientAddress,\n            [teleBTC, request.path[request.path.length - 1]],\n            [extendedRequest.remainedInputAmount, request.outputAmount],\n            1,\n            _msgSender(),\n            _txId,\n            request.appId,\n            extendedRequest.thirdParty,\n            fees,\n            _destinationChainId\n        );\n\n        emit FillerRefunded(\n            _filler,\n            _txId,\n            extendedRequest.remainedInputAmount\n        );\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Send tokens to the destination using Across\n    function _sendTokenToOtherChain(\n        uint256 _chainId,\n        address _token,\n        uint256 _amount,\n        address _user,\n        uint256 _acrossRelayerFee\n    ) private {\n        IERC20(_token).approve(across, _amount);\n        bytes memory callData = abi.encodeWithSignature(\n            \"depositV3(address,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,uint32,uint32,uint32,bytes)\",\n            acrossAdmin, // depositor\n            _user, // recipient\n            _token, // inputToken\n            address(0), // outputToken (note: fillers will replace this with the destination chain equivalent of the input token)\n            _amount, // inputAmount\n            _amount * (1e18 - _acrossRelayerFee) / 1e18, // outputAmount\n            getDestChainId(_chainId), // destinationChainId\n            address(0), // exclusiveRelayer (none for now)\n            uint32(block.timestamp), // quoteTimestamp\n            uint32(block.timestamp + 4 hours), // fillDeadline (4 hours from now)\n            0, // exclusivityDeadline\n            bytes(\"\") // message (empty bytes)\n        );\n\n        // Append integrator identifier\n        bytes memory finalCallData = abi.encodePacked(callData, hex\"1dc0de0083\"); // delimiter (1dc0de) + integratorID (0x0083)\n\n        Address.functionCall(\n            across,\n            finalCallData\n        );\n    }\n\n    function _wrapAndSwap(\n        address _exchangeConnector,\n        bytes memory _lockerLockingScript,\n        bytes32 _txId,\n        address[] memory _path,\n        uint256 _acrossRelayerFee, // TODO: get the bridge fee from teleporter (use this as maximum amount of it)\n        uint256 _chainId\n    ) private {\n        (bool result, uint256[] memory amounts) = _swap(\n            ICcExchangeRouter.swapArguments(\n                _chainId,\n                _lockerLockingScript,\n                ccExchangeRequests[_txId],\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId],\n                _txId,\n                _path,\n                _exchangeConnector\n            )\n        );\n\n        if (result) {\n            // If swap was successfull, user will get tokens on destination chain\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].isRequestCompleted = true;\n\n            // Send fees to the teleporter, treasury, and third party\n            _sendFees(_txId, _lockerLockingScript);\n\n            if (_chainId != chainId) {\n                // If the destination chain is not the current chain\n                _sendTokenToOtherChain(\n                    extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].chainId,\n                    _path[_path.length - 1],\n                    amounts[amounts.length - 1],\n                    ccExchangeRequests[_txId].recipientAddress,\n                    _acrossRelayerFee\n                );\n            }\n        } else {\n            // If swap failed, keep TeleBTC in the contract for retry\n            uint fees = extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdPartyFee +\n                       extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].protocolFee +\n                       ccExchangeRequests[_txId].fee +\n                       extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].lockerFee;\n\n            // We don't take fees (except the locker fee) in the case of failed wrapAndSwap\n            extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].remainedInputAmount += fees;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Swap TeleBTC for the output token\n    function _swap(\n        ICcExchangeRouter.swapArguments memory swapArguments\n    ) private returns (bool result, uint256[] memory amounts) {\n        // Give allowance to exchange connector for swapping\n        ITeleBTC(teleBTC).approve(\n            swapArguments._exchangeConnector,\n            swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.remainedInputAmount\n        );\n\n        // Check if the provided path is valid\n        require(\n            swapArguments._path[0] == teleBTC &&\n                swapArguments._path[swapArguments._path.length - 1] ==\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.path[\n                    swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.path.length - 1\n                ],\n            \"CcExchangeRouter: invalid path\"\n        );\n\n        // Swap teleBTC for the output token\n        // Swapped token is sent to the contract\n        (result, amounts) = IDexConnector(swapArguments._exchangeConnector)\n            .swap(\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.remainedInputAmount,\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.outputAmount *\n                    (MAX_BRIDGE_FEE /\n                        (MAX_BRIDGE_FEE -\n                            swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.bridgeFee)),\n                swapArguments._path,\n                address(this),\n                block.timestamp,\n                true\n            );\n\n        if (result) {\n            // Successfull swap\n            if (swapArguments.destinationChainId == chainId) {\n                // Send swapped token to the user for current chain requests\n                address _outputToken = swapArguments._path[\n                    swapArguments._path.length - 1\n                ];\n                uint256 _outputAmount = amounts[amounts.length - 1];\n                if (_outputToken != wrappedNativeToken) {\n                    // Send swapped token to the user\n                    ITeleBTC(_outputToken).transfer(\n                        swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.recipientAddress,\n                        _outputAmount\n                    );\n                } else {\n                    // Unwrap the wrapped native token\n                    WETH(wrappedNativeToken).withdraw(_outputAmount);\n                    // Send native token to the user\n                    Address.sendValue(\n                        payable(\n                            swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.recipientAddress\n                        ),\n                        _outputAmount\n                    );\n                }\n            }\n\n            uint256 bridgeFee = (amounts[amounts.length - 1] *\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.bridgeFee) /\n                MAX_BRIDGE_FEE;\n\n            uint256[5] memory fees = [\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.fee,\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.lockerFee,\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.protocolFee,\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.thirdPartyFee,\n                bridgeFee\n            ];\n\n            emit NewWrapAndSwap(\n                ILockersManager(lockers).getLockerTargetAddress(\n                    swapArguments._lockerLockingScript\n                ),\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.recipientAddress,\n                [teleBTC, swapArguments._path[swapArguments._path.length - 1]], // [input token, output token]\n                [amounts[0], amounts[amounts.length - 1] - bridgeFee], // [input amount, output amount]\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.speed,\n                _msgSender(), // Teleporter address\n                swapArguments._txId,\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.appId,\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.thirdParty,\n                fees,\n                swapArguments.destinationChainId\n            );\n        } else {\n            // Failed swap\n            uint256[5] memory fees = [\n                uint256(0),\n                uint256(0),\n                uint256(0),\n                uint256(0),\n                uint256(0)\n            ];\n            emit FailedWrapAndSwap(\n                ILockersManager(lockers).getLockerTargetAddress(\n                    swapArguments._lockerLockingScript\n                ),\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.recipientAddress,\n                [teleBTC, swapArguments._path[swapArguments._path.length - 1]], // [input token, output token]\n                [\n                    swapArguments\n                        ._extendedCcExchangeRequest\n                        .remainedInputAmount,\n                    0\n                ], // [input amount, output amount]\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.speed,\n                _msgSender(), // Teleporter address\n                swapArguments._txId,\n                swapArguments._ccExchangeRequest.appId,\n                swapArguments._extendedCcExchangeRequest.thirdParty,\n                fees,\n                swapArguments.destinationChainId\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Mints teleBTC by calling lockers contract\n    /// @param _lockerLockingScript Locker's locking script\n    /// @param _txId The transaction ID of the request\n    function _mintAndCalculateFees(\n        bytes memory _lockerLockingScript,\n        bytes32 _txId\n    ) private {\n        // Mints teleBTC for cc exchange router\n        ILockersManager(lockers).mint(\n            _lockerLockingScript,\n            address(this),\n            ccExchangeRequests[_txId].inputAmount\n        );\n\n        // Calculates fees\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].protocolFee =\n            (ccExchangeRequests[_txId].inputAmount * protocolPercentageFee) /\n            MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE;\n        uint256 networkFee = ccExchangeRequests[_txId].fee;\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdPartyFee =\n            (ccExchangeRequests[_txId].inputAmount *\n                thirdPartyFee[extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdParty]) /\n            MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE;\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].lockerFee =\n            (ccExchangeRequests[_txId].inputAmount * lockerPercentageFee) /\n            MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE;\n\n        extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].remainedInputAmount =\n            ccExchangeRequests[_txId].inputAmount -\n            (\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].lockerFee +\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].protocolFee +\n                networkFee +\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdPartyFee\n            );\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Transfers all associated fees for a successful swap\n    /// @param _txId The transaction ID of the request\n    function _sendFees(bytes32 _txId, bytes memory _lockerLockingScript) private {\n        /* \n        Send fees:\n            1. Teleporter fee (network fee)\n            2. Protocol fee\n            3. Third party fee\n        */\n        // Transfer network fee to teleporter\n        if (ccExchangeRequests[_txId].fee > 0) {\n            ITeleBTC(teleBTC).transfer(\n                _msgSender(),\n                ccExchangeRequests[_txId].fee\n            );\n        }\n        \n        // Transfer protocol fee to treasury\n        if (extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].protocolFee > 0) {\n            ITeleBTC(teleBTC).transfer(\n                treasury,\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].protocolFee\n            );\n        }\n        \n        // Transfer third party fee\n        if (extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdPartyFee > 0) {\n            ITeleBTC(teleBTC).transfer(\n                thirdPartyAddress[\n                    extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdParty\n                ],\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdPartyFee\n            );\n        }\n\n        // Transfer locker fee to locker\n        if (extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].lockerFee > 0) {\n            _sendLockerFee(\n                ILockersManager(lockers).getLockerTargetAddress(\n                    _lockerLockingScript\n                ),\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].lockerFee,\n                extendedCcExchangeRequests[_txId].thirdParty\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    function _sendLockerFee(address _locker, uint _lockerFee, uint _thirdParty) internal {\n        if (_lockerFee > 0) {\n            if (rewardDistributor == address(0) || _thirdParty != 0) {\n                // Send reward directly to locker\n                ITeleBTC(teleBTC).transfer(_locker, _lockerFee);\n            } else {\n                // Call reward distributor to distribute reward\n                ITeleBTC(teleBTC).approve(rewardDistributor, _lockerFee);\n                Address.functionCall(\n                    rewardDistributor,\n                    abi.encodeWithSignature(\n                        \"depositReward(address,uint256)\",\n                        _locker,\n                        _lockerFee\n                    )\n                );\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for relay contract address\n    function _setRelay(address _relay) private nonZeroAddress(_relay) {\n        emit NewRelay(relay, _relay);\n        relay = _relay;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for specialTeleporter address\n    function _setSpecialTeleporter(\n        address _specialTeleporter\n    ) private nonZeroAddress(_specialTeleporter) {\n        emit NewSpecialTeleporter(specialTeleporter, _specialTeleporter);\n        specialTeleporter = _specialTeleporter;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for lockers contract address\n    function _setLockers(address _lockers) private nonZeroAddress(_lockers) {\n        emit NewLockers(lockers, _lockers);\n        lockers = _lockers;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for teleBTC contract address\n    function _setTeleBTC(address _teleBTC) private nonZeroAddress(_teleBTC) {\n        emit NewTeleBTC(teleBTC, _teleBTC);\n        teleBTC = _teleBTC;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for protocol percentage fee\n    function _setProtocolPercentageFee(uint256 _protocolPercentageFee) private {\n        require(\n            MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE >= _protocolPercentageFee,\n            \"CCExchangeRouter: fee is out of range\"\n        );\n        emit NewProtocolPercentageFee(\n            protocolPercentageFee,\n            _protocolPercentageFee\n        );\n        protocolPercentageFee = _protocolPercentageFee;\n    }\n\n    function _setLockerPercentageFee(uint256 _lockerPercentageFee) private {\n        require(\n            MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE >= _lockerPercentageFee,\n            \"CCExchangeRouter: fee is out of range\"\n        );\n        lockerPercentageFee = _lockerPercentageFee;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for starting block number\n    function _setStartingBlockNumber(uint256 _startingBlockNumber) private {\n        require(\n            _startingBlockNumber > startingBlockNumber,\n            \"CCExchangeRouter: low startingBlockNumber\"\n        );\n        startingBlockNumber = _startingBlockNumber;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for treasury\n    function _setTreasury(address _treasury) private nonZeroAddress(_treasury) {\n        emit NewTreasury(treasury, _treasury);\n        treasury = _treasury;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for across\n    function _setAcross(address _across) private {\n        emit AcrossUpdated(across, _across);\n        across = _across;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for burnRouter\n    function _setBurnRouter(\n        address _burnRouter\n    ) private nonZeroAddress(_burnRouter) {\n        emit BurnRouterUpdated(burnRouter, _burnRouter);\n        burnRouter = _burnRouter;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for third party address\n    function _setThirdPartyAddress(\n        uint256 _thirdPartyId,\n        address _thirdPartyAddress\n    ) private {\n        emit NewThirdPartyAddress(\n            _thirdPartyId,\n            thirdPartyAddress[_thirdPartyId],\n            _thirdPartyAddress\n        );\n        thirdPartyAddress[_thirdPartyId] = _thirdPartyAddress;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for third party fee\n    function _setThirdPartyFee(\n        uint256 _thirdPartyId,\n        uint256 _thirdPartyFee\n    ) private {\n        emit NewThirdPartyFee(\n            _thirdPartyId,\n            thirdPartyFee[_thirdPartyId],\n            _thirdPartyFee\n        );\n        thirdPartyFee[_thirdPartyId] = _thirdPartyFee;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for wrappedNativeToken\n    function _setWrappedNativeToken(address _wrappedNativeToken) private {\n        emit NewWrappedNativeToken(wrappedNativeToken, _wrappedNativeToken);\n        wrappedNativeToken = _wrappedNativeToken;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Internal setter for chain id mapping\n    function _setChainIdMapping(\n        uint256 _destinationChain,\n        uint256 _mappedId\n    ) private {\n        emit NewChainIdMapping(_destinationChain, _mappedId);\n        chainIdMapping[_mappedId] = chainIdStruct(chainId, _destinationChain);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x3d6f5d233f7132153b30a69b8cc4d96e50781b3c737eb3ebb500a93e7c82130d","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/CcExchangeRouterStorage.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\nimport \"./interfaces/ICcExchangeRouter.sol\";\n\nabstract contract CcExchangeRouterStorage is ICcExchangeRouter {\n\n    // Constants\n    uint constant MAX_PERCENTAGE_FEE = 10000; // 10000 means 100%\n\n    // Public variables\n    uint public override startingBlockNumber;\n    uint public override chainId;\n    uint public override protocolPercentageFee; // A number between 0 to 10000\n    address public override relay;\n    address public override specialTeleporter;\n    address public override lockers;\n    address public override teleBTC;\n    address public override treasury;\n    mapping(uint => address) public override exchangeConnector; \n    // ^ Mapping from app id to exchange connector address \n\n    // Private variables\n    mapping(bytes32 => ccExchangeRequest) internal ccExchangeRequests;\n}\n","keccak256":"0xaab4e0245eca5a0f4581168a9ee8b64540bd45f915e6887ab5c2fb6e3101f863","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/CcExchangeRouterStorageV2.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\nimport \"./interfaces/ICcExchangeRouter.sol\";\n\nabstract contract CcExchangeRouterStorageV2 is ICcExchangeRouter {\n    // Constants\n    uint constant MAX_BRIDGE_FEE = 10 ** 18;\n    address constant NATIVE_TOKEN = address(1);\n\n    // Removed variables\n    uint one;\n    mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => FillerData)) two;\n    mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => PrefixFillSum)) three;\n    mapping(bytes32 => FillData) four;\n\n    // New variables (Ethereum support)\n\n    mapping(uint => mapping(address => bool)) public override isTokenSupported;\n    // ^ Mapping to store supported exchange tokens\n    mapping(uint => bool) public override isChainSupported;\n    // ^ Mapping to store supported chainIds\n    mapping(bytes32 => extendedCcExchangeRequest)\n        public extendedCcExchangeRequests;\n\n    address public override across;\n    address public wrappedNativeToken;\n    address public override burnRouter;\n\n    mapping(uint => chainIdStruct) public chainIdMapping;\n\n    // New variables (third party)\n\n    // Other applications can integrate with TeleSwap.\n    // ID will be assigned to them\n    // They will receive a third party fee for each transaction that is sent by them\n    // This fee will be send to their third party address\n\n    mapping(uint => uint) public thirdPartyFee;\n    mapping(uint => address) public thirdPartyAddress;\n\n    // New variables (filler)\n    mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => mapping(address => mapping(uint => mapping(uint => mapping(uint => address))))))\n        public fillerAddress;\n    // ^ [txId][recipient][token][amount][chainId][bridgeFee] to filler address\n    uint constant REGULAR_SLIPPAGE = 1500; // Not used\n\n    address public acrossAdmin;\n\n    uint public lockerPercentageFee;\n\n    address public rewardDistributor;\n}\n","keccak256":"0x9f633a6d68da5fb2f90bbb134d48331049c517cbca31de513070f3041dac2874","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/RequestParser.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\n/// @notice Library for parsing cc transfer and cc exchange requests\nlibrary RequestParser {\n    /// @notice Returns chain id of the request\n    /// @param _arbitraryData Data written in Bitcoin tx\n    function parseChainId(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint16 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 0, 1);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 2))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns app id of the request\n    /// @dev Determines the app that request belongs to (e.g. cc transfer app id is 0)\n    function parseAppId(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint8 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 2, 2);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 1))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns recipient address\n    /// @dev Minted TeleBTC or exchanged tokens will be sent to this address\n    function parseRecipientAddress(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (address parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 3, 22);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 20))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns network fee\n    /// @dev This fee goes to Teleporter who submitted the request\n    function parseNetworkFee(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint24 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 23, 25);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 3))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Determines type of the request\n    /// @dev 0 for normal requests, 1 for fixed-rate requests\n    function parseSpeed(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint8 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 26, 26);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 1))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns id of third party\n    /// @dev 0 for no third party\n    function parseThirdPartyId(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint8 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 27, 27);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 1))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns address of exchange token\n    /// @dev Minted TeleBTC will be exchanged for this token\n    function parseExchangeToken(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (address parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 28, 47);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 20))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns min expected output (exchange) amount\n    function parseExchangeOutputAmount(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint112 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 48, 61);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 14))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns across percentage fee\n    /// @dev This fee goes to across relayers\n    function parseArossFeePercentage(\n        bytes memory _arbitraryData\n    ) internal pure returns (uint24 parsedValue) {\n        bytes memory slicedBytes = sliceBytes(_arbitraryData, 62, 64);\n        assembly {\n            parsedValue := mload(add(slicedBytes, 3))\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Returns the sliced bytes\n    /// @param _data Slicing data\n    /// @param _start index of slicing\n    /// @param _end index of slicing\n    function sliceBytes(\n        bytes memory _data,\n        uint _start,\n        uint _end\n    ) internal pure returns (bytes memory _result) {\n        bytes1 temp;\n        for (uint i = _start; i < _end + 1; i++) {\n            temp = _data[i];\n            _result = abi.encodePacked(_result, temp);\n        }\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xc1ee0735d5b6eca3b780104c46a81e93790642a9780b13de93bb8af548ec28fb","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/interfaces/IBurnRouter.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\nimport \"@teleportdao/btc-evm-bridge/contracts/types/ScriptTypesEnum.sol\";\n\ninterface IBurnRouter {\n    // Structures\n\n    /// @notice Structure for recording cc burn requests\n    /// @param amount of tokens that user wants to burn\n    /// @param burntAmount that user will receive (after reducing fees from amount)\n    /// @param sender Address of user who requests burning\n    /// @param userScript Script hash of the user on Bitcoin\n    /// @param deadline of locker for executing the request\n    /// @param isTransferred True if the request has been processed\n    /// @param scriptType The script type of the user\n    /// @param requestIdOfLocker The index of the request for a specific locker\n    struct burnRequest {\n        uint amount;\n        uint burntAmount;\n        address sender;\n        bytes userScript;\n        uint deadline;\n        bool isTransferred;\n        ScriptTypes scriptType;\n        uint requestIdOfLocker;\n    }\n\n    // Events\n\n    /// @notice Emits when a burn request gets submitted\n    /// @param userScript Script of user on Bitcoin\n    /// @param scriptType Script type of the user (for bitcoin address)\n    /// @param lockerTargetAddress Address of Locker\n    /// @param userTargetAddress Address of the user on EVM\n    /// @param requestIdOfLocker Index of request between Locker's burn requests\n    /// @param deadline of Locker for executing the request (in terms of Bitcoin blocks)\n    /// @param thirdPartyId Id of third party\n    /// @param inputToken inputToken address\n    /// @param amounts [inputAmount, teleBTCAmount, burntAmount]\n    /// @param fees [network fee, locker fee, protocol fee, third party fee]\n    event NewUnwrap(\n        bytes userScript,\n        ScriptTypes scriptType,\n        address lockerTargetAddress,\n        address indexed userTargetAddress,\n        uint requestIdOfLocker,\n        uint indexed deadline,\n        uint thirdPartyId,\n        address inputToken,\n        uint[3] amounts,\n        uint[4] fees\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when a burn proof is provided\n    /// @param lockerTargetAddress Address of Locker\n    /// @param requestIdOfLocker Index of paid request of among Locker's requests\n    /// @param bitcoinTxId The hash of tx that paid a burn request\n    /// @param bitcoinTxOutputIndex The output index in tx\n    event PaidUnwrap(\n        address indexed lockerTargetAddress,\n        uint requestIdOfLocker,\n        bytes32 bitcoinTxId,\n        uint bitcoinTxOutputIndex\n    );\n\n    /// @notice  Emits when a locker gets slashed for withdrawing BTC without proper reason\n    /// @param _lockerTargetAddress\tLocker's address on the target chain\n    /// @param _blockNumber\tBlock number of the malicious tx\n    /// @param txId\tTransaction ID of the malicious tx\n    /// @param amount Slashed amount\n    event LockerDispute(\n        address _lockerTargetAddress,\n        bytes lockerLockingScript,\n        uint _blockNumber,\n        bytes32 txId,\n        uint amount\n    );\n\n    event BurnDispute(\n        address indexed userTargetAddress,\n        address indexed _lockerTargetAddress,\n        bytes lockerLockingScript,\n        uint requestIdOfLocker\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when relay address is updated\n    event NewRelay(address oldRelay, address newRelay);\n\n    /// @notice Emits when treasury address is updated\n    event NewTreasury(address oldTreasury, address newTreasury);\n\n    /// @notice Emits when lockers address is updated\n    event NewLockers(address oldLockers, address newLockers);\n\n    /// @notice Emits when TeleBTC address is updated\n    event NewTeleBTC(address oldTeleBTC, address newTeleBTC);\n\n    /// @notice Emits when transfer deadline is updated\n    event NewTransferDeadline(\n        uint oldTransferDeadline,\n        uint newTransferDeadline\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when percentage fee is updated\n    event NewProtocolPercentageFee(\n        uint oldProtocolPercentageFee,\n        uint newProtocolPercentageFee\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when slasher percentage fee is updated\n    event NewSlasherPercentageFee(\n        uint oldSlasherPercentageFee,\n        uint newSlasherPercentageFee\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when network fee is updated\n    event NewNetworkFee(uint oldNetworkFee, uint newNetworkFee);\n\n    /// @notice Emits when network fee oracle is updated\n    event NewNetworkFeeOracle(\n        address oldNetworkFeeOracle,\n        address newNetworkFeeOracle\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when changes made to third party address\n    event NewThirdPartyAddress(\n        uint thirdPartyId,\n        address oldThirdPartyAddress,\n        address newThirdPartyAddress\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when changes made to third party fee\n    event NewThirdPartyFee(\n        uint thirdPartyId,\n        uint oldThirdPartyFee,\n        uint newThirdPartyFee\n    );\n\n\tevent NewWrappedNativeToken(\n        address oldWrappedNativeToken,\n        address newWrappedNativeToken\n    );\n\n    // Read-only functions\n\n    function isTransferred(\n        address _lockerTargetAddress,\n        uint _index\n    ) external view returns (bool);\n\n    function startingBlockNumber() external view returns (uint);\n\n    function relay() external view returns (address);\n\n    function lockers() external view returns (address);\n\n    function teleBTC() external view returns (address);\n\n    function treasury() external view returns (address);\n\n    function transferDeadline() external view returns (uint);\n\n    function protocolPercentageFee() external view returns (uint);\n\n    function slasherPercentageReward() external view returns (uint);\n\n    function bitcoinFee() external view returns (uint); // Bitcoin transaction fee\n\n    function isUsedAsBurnProof(bytes32 _txId) external view returns (bool);\n\n    function bitcoinFeeOracle() external view returns (address);\n\n    // State-changing functions\n\n    function setStartingBlockNumber(uint _startingBlockNumber) external;\n\n    function setRelay(address _relay) external;\n\n    function setLockers(address _lockers) external;\n\n    function setTeleBTC(address _teleBTC) external;\n\n    function setTreasury(address _treasury) external;\n\n    function setTransferDeadline(uint _transferDeadline) external;\n\n    function setProtocolPercentageFee(uint _protocolPercentageFee) external;\n\n    function setLockerPercentageFee(uint _lockerPercentageFee) external;\n\n    function setSlasherPercentageReward(uint _slasherPercentageReward) external;\n\n    function setNetworkFee(uint _networkFee) external;\n\n    function setNetworkFeeOracle(address _networkFeeOracle) external;\n\n    function setRewardDistributor(address _rewardDistributor) external;\n\n    function setThirdPartyAddress(\n        uint _thirdPartyId,\n        address _thirdPartyAddress\n    ) external;\n\n    function setThirdPartyFee(uint _thirdPartyId, uint _thirdPartyFee) external;\n\n    function setWrappedNativeToken(address _wrappedNativeToken) external;\n\n    function unwrap(\n        uint _amount,\n        bytes calldata _userScript,\n        ScriptTypes _scriptType,\n        bytes calldata _lockerLockingScript,\n        uint thirdParty\n    ) external returns (uint);\n\n    function swapAndUnwrap(\n        address _exchangeConnector,\n        uint[] calldata _amounts,\n        bool _isFixedToken,\n        address[] calldata _path,\n        uint256 _deadline,\n        bytes memory _userScript,\n        ScriptTypes _scriptType,\n        bytes calldata _lockerLockingScript,\n        uint thirdParty\n    ) external payable returns (uint);\n\n    function burnProof(\n        bytes4 _version,\n        bytes memory _vin,\n        bytes memory _vout,\n        bytes4 _locktime,\n        uint256 _blockNumber,\n        bytes memory _intermediateNodes,\n        uint _index,\n        bytes memory _lockerLockingScript,\n        uint[] memory _burnReqIndexes,\n        uint[] memory _voutIndexes\n    ) external payable returns (bool);\n\n    function disputeBurn(\n        bytes calldata _lockerLockingScript,\n        uint[] memory _indices\n    ) external;\n\n    function disputeLocker(\n        bytes memory _lockerLockingScript,\n        bytes4[] memory _versions, // [inputTxVersion, outputTxVersion]\n        bytes memory _inputVin,\n        bytes memory _inputVout,\n        bytes memory _outputVin,\n        bytes memory _outputVout,\n        bytes4[] memory _locktimes, // [inputTxLocktime, outputTxLocktime]\n        bytes memory _inputIntermediateNodes,\n        uint[] memory _indexesAndBlockNumbers\n        // ^ [inputIndex, inputTxIndex, outputTxIndex, inputTxBlockNumber, outputTxBlockNumber]\n    ) external payable;\n}\n","keccak256":"0xb2cf27bea1aee62eddbdc8d950ce9a34bd0a3e54ec3f56af4a140d793c0b7517","license":"MIT"},"contracts/routers/interfaces/ICcExchangeRouter.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity >=0.8.0 <=0.8.4;\n\ninterface ICcExchangeRouter {\n\n    // Structures\n\n    struct chainIdStruct {\n        uint middleChain;\n        uint destinationChain;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Structure for recording cross-chain exchange requests\n    /// @param appId that user wants to use (which DEX)\n    /// @param inputAmount Amount of locked BTC on source chain\n    /// @param outputAmount Amount of output token\n    /// @param isFixedToken True if amount of input token is fixed\n    /// @param recipientAddress Address of exchange recipient\n    /// @param fee Amount of fee that is paid to Teleporter (for tx, relayer and teleporter fees)\n    /// @param isUsed True if tx has been submitted before\n    /// @param path Exchange path from input token to output token\n    /// @param deadline for exchanging tokens (not used anymore)\n    /// @param speed of the request (normal or instant)\n    struct ccExchangeRequest {\n        uint appId;\n        uint inputAmount;\n        uint outputAmount;\n        bool isFixedToken;\n        address recipientAddress;\n        uint fee;\n        bool isUsed;\n        address[] path;\n        uint deadline;\n        uint speed;\n        uint destinationChain;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Structure for recording cross-chain exchange requests\n    /// @param isRequestCompleted True if BTC to ETH exchange is processed successfully\n    /// @param remainedInputAmount Amount of obtained TELEBTC on target chain\n    /// @param bridgeFee percentage of fee we have to give to across relayers to fill our request\n    struct extendedCcExchangeRequest {\n        uint chainId;\n        bool isRequestCompleted;\n        uint remainedInputAmount;\n        uint bridgeFee;\n        uint thirdParty;\n        uint protocolFee;\n        uint thirdPartyFee;\n        uint lockerFee;\n    }\n    \n    /// @notice Structure for passing tx and its inclusion proof\n    /// @param version of the transaction containing the user request\n    /// @param vin Inputs of the transaction containing the user request\n    /// @param vout Outputs of the transaction containing the user request\n    /// @param locktime of the transaction containing the user request\n    /// @param blockNumber Height of the block containing the user request\n    /// @param intermediateNodes Merkle inclusion proof for transaction containing the user request\n    /// @param index of transaction containing the user request in the block\n    struct TxAndProof {\n        bytes4 version;\n        bytes vin;\n        bytes vout;\n        bytes4 locktime;\n        uint256 blockNumber;\n        bytes intermediateNodes;\n        uint index;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Structure for storing filling requests\n    /// @param startingTime First attemp to fill the request\n    /// @param reqToken Requested exchange token\n    /// @param lastUsedIdx Last used filler index\n    /// @param remainingAmountOfLastFill Amount of unused tokens of last filler\n    /// @param isWithdrawnLastFill True if last used filler has withdrawn unused tokens\n    struct FillData {\n        uint startingTime;\n        address reqToken;\n        uint lastUsedIdx;\n        uint remainingAmountOfLastFill;\n        bool isWithdrawnLastFill;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Structure for storing fillers of a request\n    /// @param index of filler between fillers\n    /// @param token that filler used to fill\n    /// @param amount that filler sent to fill\n    struct FillerData {\n        uint index;\n        address token;\n        uint amount;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Structure for storing fillings\n    /// @param prefixSum Cumulative sum of fillings\n    /// @param currentIndex Next filler index\n    struct PrefixFillSum {\n        uint[] prefixSum;\n        uint currentIndex;\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Structure for passing arguments to swap function\n    struct swapArguments {\n        uint destinationChainId;\n        bytes _lockerLockingScript;\n        ccExchangeRequest _ccExchangeRequest;\n        extendedCcExchangeRequest _extendedCcExchangeRequest;\n        bytes32 _txId;\n        address[] _path;\n        address _exchangeConnector;\n    }\n\n    // Events\n\n    event AcrossUpdated(\n        address oldAcross,\n        address newAcross\n    );\n\n    event BurnRouterUpdated(\n        address oldBurnRouter,\n        address newBurnRouter\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when a new filler fills a request\n    /// @param filler Address of filler\n    /// @param txId Bitcoin request id\n    /// @param token that used for filling\n    /// @param amount that sent for filling\n    event RequestFilled(\n        address filler,\n        bytes32 txId,\n        address recipient, \n        address token,\n        uint amount,\n        uint destinationChainId,\n        uint acrossRelayerFee\n    );\n\n    event FillerRefunded(\n        address filler,\n        bytes32 txId,\n        uint amount\n    );\n\n    /// @notice Emits when a cc exchange request gets done\n    /// @param lockerTargetAddress Address of Locker\n    /// @param user Exchange recipient address\n    /// @param inputAndOutputToken [inputToken, outputToken]\n    /// @param inputAndOutputAmount [inputAmount, outputAmount]\n    /// @param speed Speed of the request (normal or instant)\n    /// @param teleporter Address of teleporter who submitted the request\n    /// @param bitcoinTxId The transaction ID of request on Bitcoin \n    /// @param appId Assigned application id to exchange\n    /// @param thirdPartyId Id of third party\n    /// @param fees [network fee, locker fee, protocol fee, third party fee, bridge fee]\n    /// @param destinationChainId chain id of destination \n    event NewWrapAndSwap(\n        address lockerTargetAddress,\n        address indexed user,\n        address[2] inputAndOutputToken,\n        uint[2] inputAndOutputAmount,\n        uint indexed speed,\n
